name: log_health_incident
description: Logs a poultry health-related incident (sickness, mortality, feed refusal, etc.) and provides contextual advice with a vet disclaimer.

response.description: Friendly, clear guidance in the detected language, including recommended immediate actions and a reminder to consult a vet. Ask only one missing info at a time.

incident_type.description: Auto-inferred from farmerâ€™s message (symptoms like nagsusuka = sickness, namatay = mortality, ayaw kumain = feed_rejection).

incident_date.description: Only accept a date in this format YYYY/MM/DD, if not match/given ask

affected_count.description: Number of birds affected. If missing, ask: 'Ilang manok po ang apektado?'.

symptoms.description: Extract all symptoms mentioned (e.g., nagsusuka, matamlay, may sipon).

suspected_cause.description: Inferred based on symptoms (e.g., possible Newcastle, heat stress, feed contamination).

actions_taken.description: List immediate steps based on severity (mild, moderate, severe).

feed_info.description: Feed details mentioned (product name, batch code) if any.

requires_vet_visit.description: Always true since vet consultation is recommended.

next_action.description: Set to 'ask_next' if critical info is missing (e.g., affected_count), otherwise 'log_complete'.
